documentation.description: Retrieve information for a given username (if the current user has permission to retrieve user details). Configure template(org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure) must be called before calling this template.

description.span: object representing the user referenced by the given username.

documentation.sample: <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure"> <with-param name="jira.uri" value="http://myjira.com:8080/jira/"/> <with-param name="jira.username" value="admin"/> <with-param name="jira.password" value="admin"/> </call-template> <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.getUser"> <with-param name="jira.requiredUsername" value="manuranga"/> </call-template>

parameter.name: jira.requiredUsername
parameter.description: the username of the user for whom we require details
